TrainingRecord.title: Training Record
TrainingRecord.description: Represents a record of a completed training session by a worker.

workerName.description: The name of the worker who completed the training.

noiseScore.description: The score for the noise module.

particulateScore.description: The score for the particulate matter module.

completionDate.description: The date and time the training was completed.

/trainingRecords/{recordId}.description: Stores records of completed training sessions.
